measured_by: difference in proportion of approach vs. avoidance words in text corpora (Relative Sentiment Shift series)
justification: The article states that for each document, "the proportion of words signaling approach ... and avoidance words ... was calculated, with the difference between these indices constituting relative sentiment," which Nyman et al. use as an indicator of economic sentiment.

measured_by: topic-modeling–based index of narrative homogeneity across documents
justification: It notes that Nyman et al. "used topic modeling to assign each article ... and compute the degree of narrative topic consensus at each time point," treating this modeled consensus as a quantitative measure of narrative homogeneity.
